dataList.dlg: I've followed the flow into this place, and I'll cut down all that blocks it.
I normally get up early in the morning. Watching the sun rise in the horizon gives me the feeling that the day has begun.
Rodion... She kept on insisting that she take me to a restaurant. Though the concept is alien to me, it would seem that some people get joy from eating.
When you wish to clear your mind, admiring the moonlight can help.
You shouldn't hold back from cutting down any obstacles that stand in your way, even if it wounds your heart as well.
I don't like long conversations. No words are more honest than a clash of blades.
Carrying around a sword naturally makes your mind calm and your actions swift.
To become a leader is akin to sailing in a vast sea. It's a gargantuan task, with no destination in clear sight...but there is nowhere to fall back to.
To what extent are you willing to go for the sake of your goal, Executive Manager? And how much of yourself can you withstand forfeiting?
These days, advanced technology makes erasing stains of blood a trivial task. As though it's only right that we forget about death that easily.
If you wish... I shall serve you.
I will dispatch them.
It's time to make blades meet.
I'd appreciate it if you could keep it simple.
I won't stand back.
I should be able to slay them with ease.
Mmpf!
A result earned through calmness.
That must be tough to recover, Executive Manager.
I see you know your way around a sword.
It was my fault for neglecting to train.
I only followed the path I saw.
I slew them all, dancing along the flow.
I have no regrets.
